definition: to support with the hand/to help sb up/to support oneself by holding onto something/to help
fence/railing/hurdle/column or box (of text or other data)

sentences.english: He kept his hand on the rail as he climbed the steps.
sentences.chinese: 他攀上臺階時，手不離扶欄。

sentences.english: The black and white painted banister tempers the shock of colour.
sentences.chinese: 而白與黑的扶欄緩和了整個空間給人的衝擊。
